scripts.install-armv7: rm -rf target/geth && mkdir -p target/geth && curl --output target/geth.tar.gz https://gethstore.blob.core.windows.net/builds/geth-alltools-linux-arm7-1.8.15-89451f7c.tar.gz && gunzip -c target/geth.tar.gz | tar xopf - -C target/geth --strip-components 1
scripts.install-macos: rm -rf target/geth && mkdir -p target/geth && curl --output target/geth.tar.gz https://gethstore.blob.core.windows.net/builds/geth-alltools-darwin-amd64-1.8.15-89451f7c.tar.gz && gunzip -c target/geth.tar.gz | tar xopf - -C target/geth --strip-components 1
scripts.poa-genesis-1: rm -rf target/geth-data/node1 && mkdir -p target/geth-data && cp -rf src/geth/node1 target/geth-data && target/geth/geth --datadir target/geth-data/node1 init src/poa/genesis.json
